typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct Roles.Role storage pointer,address) view returns (bool)

nodes.documentation:
@title Roles
@dev Library for managing addresses assigned to a Role.
nodes.name: Roles

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct Roles.Role storage pointer,address) view returns (bool)

nodes.documentation: @dev give an account access to this role
nodes.name: add

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct Roles.Role storage pointer,address) view returns (bool)

nodes.documentation: @dev remove an account's access to this role
nodes.name: remove

nodes.documentation:
@dev check if an account has this role
@return bool
nodes.name: has
